title: Academic Writing Competency Enhancement Through Integrated Writing Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic grasp of academic writing structures and intermediate-level English reading proficiency
context.additional_context: Providing integrated writing assessment experiences using digital devices in a customized project-based learning environment for working adult learners.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze given source texts to extract core ideas and logically connect them
Learners can write source-based argumentative essays following academic writing conventions
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of source utilization strategies (idea generation/grammar-vocabulary modeling) through self-assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
